attributes.action: MUDDY PAWS CRIME wants the government and the police to take pet theft seriously
attributes.additional_details: With the rise in pet theft so much needs to be done .We at Muddypawscrime endeavour to stop the jigsaw puzzle of theft being stealing dogs, illegal breeding , dog fighting (bait dogs) and more. We want websites to STOP selling animals which are feeding thieves People to register with their council if selling one litter as that is undeclared income and can prevent dogs having a life of breeding. Also Councils to inspect and puppy farms rescues once a month . Ideally we want to end puppy farming.
attributes.background: We want websites to STOP selling animals.We want people to have to register with their council if selling one litter as that is undeclared income and can prevent dogs having a life of breeding. Also Councils to inspect rescues and puppy farms  once a month.Stolen dog owners need victim support.
